acts.what: AATT with HTML CodeSniffer WCAG 2.1 AA ruleset

result.msg: The html element should have a lang or xml:lang attribute which describes the language of the document.
Check that this element has an inherited foreground colour to complement the corresponding inline background colour or image.
result.code:
<body bgcolor="#ffffff"
leftmargin="0" topmargin="20"
rightmargin="0"
bottommargin="0">


<table width="100%"
cellspacing="0"
cellpadding...</body>

result.msg: Semantic markup should be used to mark emphasised or special text so that it can be programmatically determined.
Img element is the only content of the link, but is missing alt text. The alt text should describe the purpose of the link.
